detail_desc: Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and zip at the back.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Body in soft cotton jersey with a wide flounce at the top in a cotton weave. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester. Chunky patterned soles.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a shimmering metallic finish and visible zip at the back. Lined.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a textured weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, and pockets in the side seams.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with a low-cut back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
V-neck body in lace and mesh with lined cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and press-studs at the crotch.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a large flounce over one shoulder, a round neck and a yoke at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem with a slit at the back.
Pyjamas in soft jersey with a long-sleeved top and wide trousers. Top with a rounded hem and slightly longer back. Bottoms with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This timeless sweatshirt is made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Double-breasted trenchcoat woven in a sturdy cotton blend with notch lapels, shoulder tabs and a loose yoke front and back. Detachable, adjustable belt at the waist, welt side pockets, an adjustable tab and fastener at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Headband in a soft rib knit with a sparkly stone appliqué on the front.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket trousers in stretch fabric with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Short skirt in a patterned weave with a sewn-in wrapover with decorative buttons at the front and a zip at the back. Lined.

Oversized jacket in washed denim with worn details, a collar, dropped shoulders and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the back. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with long sleeves, thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Trousers in a stretch cotton blend with wide ribbing at the waist for added comfort. Fake welt pockets at the back and tapered legs with pleats.

Shell jacket in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with taped seams and waterproof zips. Hood with an elasticated drawstring and small peak, a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets, a hook and loop tab at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cardigan in a soft, double-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front with a stocking-stitched button band, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Set with a skirt with straps in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a short-sleeved top in cotton jersey. Skirt with an elasticated waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable fasteners. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and flounced cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with long raglan sleeves.
Derby shoes with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.

Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a small collar and V-neck with a concealed button. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves, front pockets and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Fully lined swimsuit in textured fabric with a large decorative bow at the top. The polyamide and polyester contents of the swimsuit are recycled.

Quilted, padded baseball jacket in woven fabric with a striped stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Side pockets, a zipped inner pocket, and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and short puff sleeves with smocked hems. Covered buttons down the front and a gathered seam under the bust that is elasticated at the back. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Double, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Suit trousers in a woven linen blend with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Pockets in the side seams, fake welt pockets at the back and straight-cut legs with creases.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers in printed stretch fabric with imitation leather details and a soft, stretchy edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fitted nursing dress in cotton-blend jersey with short sleeves and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The cotton content of the dress is organic.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Double-breasted coat in soft faux fur with wide notch lapels, welt side pockets, a detachable faux fur belt with a large plastic buckle, and a single back vent. Lined.

Push-up body in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace bodice with a hook-and-eye fastening at the top, string back and lined gusset with press-studs.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Swimsuit in UV-protective material with a print motif on the front, low polo-neck collar and a zip at the back. UPF50.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Low waist and skinny legs.
Fitted one-shoulder dress in sturdy, crinkled jersey with a sheen. One long sleeve and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
V-neck satin blouse in a straight cut with press-studs down the front, short sleeves, print stripes and contrasting colour trims.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapering legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams, elastication at the back of the waist and press-studs at the sides. Elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective detail. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Flared, sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with frill-trimmed gathered seams around the skirt. Unlined.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a faux fur pompom on top.
5-pocket bootcut jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Ankle-length track pants in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Decorative flatlock seams at the back, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Soft, non-wired bra top in microfibre with folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimum visibility under the clothes. Wide shoulder straps, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support and a double-layered hem. No fasteners.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front of the hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Jumpsuit in viscose jersey with cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and narrow elastication at the hems.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners and a heart-shaped chest pocket. Press-studs at the sides, a fake fly, front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Top in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a drawstring at the front. Seam with a flounce at the hem.
Metal ear cuffs, two smooth and one decorated with glass rhinestones and plastic beads.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbed trims on the short sides. Length 180 cm. Width 40 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Loafers with a decorative tab and moccasin seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles, and patterned soles. Height of soles 1 cm.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a V-neck with a discreet lace trim.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in crinkled jersey. Top with a narrow trim around the neckline and short, flounce-trimmed sleeves. Shorts with smocked elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and a decorative bow at the front. The cotton content of the top and shorts is organic.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, pearly buttons at the front, flap front pockets and a gently tapered waist. Lined.
Coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a detachable, braided imitation suede belt and a flared skirt.
Knee-length dress in lightly crêped satin with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam with pleats at the waist and short butterfly sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
